Text:
auge

i just finished downloading this movie. unfortunatey my drive c crashed which erased all my program files. and the problem is that I cannot extract the ISO file of this movie to dvd files. it looks like that any of my movies in NTI - ISO files in my laptop cannot be read including the RAR files. any solutions for that?
hope to hear from you soon :))

If I understand what you are saying correctly you are asking how you can unpack ISOs.

If I am wrong let me know.

Here are three options I know of:

1.       Download and install something like WINZIP/WINRAR to unpack them.

2.       Use NERO to burn ISOs to a disc without having to unpack them.

3.       DVDFab will shrink, repack and/or burn to a DVD or any combination of the three you choose.

All three of these software options should be available at your favorite torrent tracker.

Hope this helps.

Auge

auge 

it works. thanks!
